question: The Ganges Delta, the world's largest river delta, lies on two nations. Which among the following are those two nations?
explanation: Ganges Delta, also known as Sunderbans Delta or the Bengal Delta, is the world's largest river delta. This delta lies in two nations India and Bangladesh. This delta is the outlet of discharge of two important rivers-Ganga and Brahmputra-to Bay of Bengal. This delta is also known as Green Delta because of its fertile soil.
